str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.
From oikos; properly, residence, but usually an abode; by implication, a family.

str2: From meros; to part, i.e. to apportion, bestow, share, or to disunite, differ.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular

str2: From oikos; properly, residence, but usually an abode; by implication, a family.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
